title: to the support team
body:
Now, i have a question i have gotten quite a few punishments in the past, and my next one is a perma im pretty sure, i had a buddy tell me that if you have a perma as your next ban, that you can be reported by a couple players in a match and youll get banned regardless of if the reports were legit or not.

now, my question is, if i just dont say anything toxic in the chats, and i still get reported by people all the time (because lets be honest, players do report for anything even unskilled  regardless of if its a report option anymore) will i face a punishement even if its unjustified. because i have alot of money invested into my account and im doing my best to not lose it, but i know im going to get reported for just about anything under the sun for the rest of the length of the time i play this game, because thats just how this community is

so please if you could awnser this honestly that would be fantastic thanks

replies.body:
>  i had a buddy tell me that if you have a perma as your next ban, that you can be reported by a couple players in a match and youll get banned regardless of if the reports were legit or not.

Not true.

> will i face a punishement even if its unjustified

No

You won't be banned for chat if you don't type anything. What you need to understand is that anything you say that could be viewed as "toxic", even the littlest things, can lead to a permaban. You have to be very careful with what you type after a two week ban.

> [{quoted}](name=The Big Piece,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=U2RiPxx0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-09T06:41:00.606+0000)
>
> You won't be banned for chat if you don't type anything. What you need to understand is that anything you say that could be viewed as "toxic", even the littlest things, can lead to a permaban. You have to be very careful with what you type after a two week ban.

i havent had my 2 week ban for a long while s6 i believe, but regardless, i know quacks on this game report for anything and everything and im honestly scared to lose this account, so as long as i dont say anything that someone can take the wrong way im fine? even with falsified reports?

i've never received a punishment

if you want, you can play with my friends and i (so it'll be us four). i'll let you know if there's anything that might push people's buttons. you probably aren't actually even being toxic, but i know what sets people off.

at the very least, it's some games where you have a very slim chance of being reported.
feel free to add me

If your ban was that long ago its very likely your punishments have been reset and your next punishment would only be a chat restriction. But no, false reports haven't had any effect ever since they switched to the 4 tier punishment system they use now.

i believe they should have a seperate tier punishment system for inting and trolling
1 that literally doesnt just use 1 warning from 1 game and you're already at tier 3
Inting/Trolling is in fact escalated to a two week ban on the first offense, and a perma on the second. The problem is the automated system has a very hard time detecting it.

if you're banned for a bad reason flame riot's support team

until you get a LOGICAL response

> you can be reported by a couple players in a match and youll get banned regardless of if the reports were legit or not

what alot of people  don't understand is that mild harassment (such as calling for reports) is still punishable. So they think that they were not toxic, but infact it is a punishable offense.
Tbh I got off a 14 day ban on some other account and I still use chat a shit load to tell ppl what they did wrong and still no ban, I don't think they do it for just anything

You can only be banned for what you say in game. Try using /mute all or playing some less intense modes, like rotating game mode or aram. I've said previously on the boards that you can unbind the chat key from enter/return, but I don't think that's possible.
top left corner hover over it go to support log in submit a ticket and there

im under the impression that reports aren't considered false until they've been reviewed manually, so what happens, is people get their accounts padded with false reports, and then they get a real report for something minor, and had it not been for the false reports, it would have been cast aside as a bad game. but they get punished because of the sheer volume of reports on their account
